abstract: Former Pres Bill Clinton and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie are invited to speak at annual fiscal summit meeting by the Peterson Foundation; talk often veers far from budget talks, as main news is politics; Christie responds with a quick 'yes' when asked whether he was considering running for president.
lead_paragraph: Former President Bill Clinton and Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey were invited to speak at the annual fiscal summit meeting by the Peterson Foundation, where budget talks made brief appearances.

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Budget Agenda Plays Second Fiddle at Fiscal Forum
headline.print_headline: Budget Agenda Plays Second Fiddle at Fiscal Forum
